info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Washington and south central Iron Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of New Harmony, or 20 miles west of Cedar City, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newcastle. This includes the following highways... Utah Route 18 between mile markers 42 and 46. Utah Route 56 between mile markers 27 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
